channel.title: Minor on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Minor on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop 9.1 Beta is open for feedback!
item.description: PrestaShop 9.1 Beta is here, and it includes several major improvements that you can already start exploring and sharing feedback on. Your input is valuable for the final release of PrestaShop 9.1.

item.title: PrestaShop 9.1 is in feature freeze
item.description: As of December 12th, 2025, PrestaShop version 9.1 has entered the feature freeze phase. Learn more about the feature freeze, the next steps, and what’s coming in PrestaShop 9.1.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.2 Is Available
item.description: It’s been decided to release a new minor version of PrestaShop 8.2. This version includes a few improvements, as well as bug fixes.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1 Is Available
item.description: We are pleased to announce that PrestaShop 8.1 is officially available.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1 Release Candidate Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: We are happy to announce the first release candidate of PrestaShop 8.1.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1 beta is open for feedback!
item.description: The beta version of PrestaShop 8.1 is now ready for you to test!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.8.0 is available
item.description: We are happy to announce PrestaShop 1.7.8.0 is officially available!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.8.0 RC1 Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: A few months after the beta, the first release candidate for PrestaShop 1.7.8.0 is now ready for you to test!

item.title: Towards a more mobile-friendly back office
item.description: Until now, PrestaShop always relied on a desktop-first responsive design strategy. Indeed, there are few use cases on mobile. But you can’t prevent users from checking their store’s back office on their mobile!

item.title: Multistore feature in PrestaShop 1.7.8: What's new?
item.description: With the release of the new version 1.7.8 which is in progress, this article details one of the main features revamps of this version: the multistore.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.8.0 beta is open for feedback!
item.description: The first Beta version of PrestaShop 1.7.8.0 is now ready for you to test!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 is available
item.description: We are happy to announce PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 is officially available!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 RC1 Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: We are really happy to announce that we are very close to finishing the 1.7.7.0 release, the release candidate is the last step before the final version is out.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 Beta 2 Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: The second Beta version for PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 is now ready for you to test!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 Beta Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: The first Beta version for PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 is now ready for you to test!
